text:
I don't even trust sheriffs. Joe Arpaio was a sheriff. In Florida there's been accusations against sheriffs and their offices too. Go to the forums at  leoaffairs.com and you can see a lot of the accusations from inside the sheriff's offices towards the sheriff and their leadership. 

Orange County Sheriff's Office (and other agencies on scene) got away with beating a guy. They even had a helicopter recording and when they started beating him they started looking at trees.

With that said, they're definitely preferable to a centralized police force and it's good that they're elected.

https://tribwgntv.files.wordpress.com/2019/01/coins.jpg?quality=85&strip=all

Just replying so you get notified too
